amendment.description: To increase by $5,000,000 the amount authorized to be appropriated for fiscal year 2005 for the Army for procurement for weapons and tracked combat vehicles for the purpose of procuring M109-based command-and-control vehicles or field artillery ammunition support vehicles.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3239 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3239 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Santorum. (consideration: CR S7152-7160) To increase by $5,000,000 the amount authorized to be appropriated for fiscal year 2005 for the Army for procurement for weapons and tracked combat vehicles for the purpose of procuring M109-based command-and-control vehicles or field artillery ammunition support vehicles.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3239 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3239 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Santorum.
